item.sentence: The husband of the beautiful woman bought her roses and candy for her birthday.
item.question: Did the woman buy roses?

item.sentence: The patient who the doctor treated became better after only a few treatments.
Maya played with the blocks and the balls, but she soon got bored with them.
item.question: Did Maya play with the blocks?

item.sentence: The therapist set up a meeting with the upset woman and her husband yesterday.
The reporter had dinner yesterday with the baseball player who Kevin admired.
item.question: Did the reporter have dinner with Kevin?

item.sentence: The visitors at the zoo watched the zookeeper who the monkeys and apes teased.
The mother of the prisoner sent him packages that contained cookies and novels.
item.question: Did the mother send packages to the prisoner?

item.sentence: The semester will start next week, but the students and teachers are not ready.
